attributes.action: Govt to request Qatar halt World Cup Construction
attributes.additional_details:
CDM 2007 and similar European legislation ensures
the safe design and  build. of construction projects
and welfare of construction workers. The qatar gov
must be made to stop its construction for the 2022
world cup until safe systems of work are implemented.
Over 800 workers have died so far. Stop this now and get
Them to engage in Health & Safety expertise.
